original_title: Si Prinsipe Abante at ang lihim ng Ibong Adarna
overview: A vengeful and evil witch puts Prinsipe Abante's (Rene Requiestas) loving father in a deep coma-and the only cure to the king's strange illness is the sweet song of the legendary Ibong Adarna.
title: Si Prinsipe Abante at ang lihim ng Ibong Adarna
